Package src

Class Desktop

java.lang.Object
src.PC
src.Desktop
public class Desktop extends PC
Desktop class IS-A PC child that HAS 2 new components added, psu and motherboard. The class also provides methods to randomly select components and price the PC accordingly at creation, also provides methods to access and modify the two new components within the object. Overrides randomizeComponents(), toString() and pcType() from the parent class.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ahmed-Hassan Odtallah
